channel.title: AllstarMontana!
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
Our names are DigiiMajor & Joon123 ! most of you allstar players know who we are and what wheve done here . Lets just say ; WE ARE BACK ! and guess what ? we just started a hole new epic allstar server with great stuff . We hope you enjoy this BETA server for now , because we are still building this one to the next level and we just want to show you guys , how the server will looks like for how far it has been now . Lets just say : We hope you guys enjoy this . Have some goodluck playing this Server and help us out grown much as possible . thank you .
***DOWNLOADLINKS***
What have I done so far?
[ FEATURES ]
* ALL skills(except slayer - 60%) are 100% recoded and reworked the best I've could done. (see pictures below). * ANTI - SYI 100% * ANTI - HEIGHTLEVEL * ANTI - TRADEBUG * SKILL LOCATION REWORKED * SHOPS AND PRICES REWORKED * SLAYER MONSTER & BOSSES ARE ADDED( XP rates need to need to be added). * DICING SYSTEM * GSMINI * CLIENT COLOURS * BOSSES WITH WORKING SPECIALS * 100% PLAYERTITLES ! * RESTART TIMER EVERY 90MIN * ANTI DUPE * SKILLCAPE EMOTES * RARES AREA ( FOR PARTYHATS ) && theres lots which you can view below
AGILITY:
How to train AGILITY? First go to skills, ::skill command.
In the north-east corner, there is hanging a rope, just click on it and it will teleport you to AGILITY.
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/rw6wi1.png[/img]
NOW what you all have to do is run the course, SEE THE PICTURES!!!
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2wd3nk4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/inwoxu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/10citd0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/o0c5s9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/124tpch.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/f07sj6.png[/img]
That is agility.
I HOPE ENJOY IT
Farming: There are now 7 diffrent paths.
Level 1 Bush - Example: Jangerberries, Dwellberries, Red Berries, White Berries, Poison Ivy & more Level 25 - Calquat Tree Level 45 - Cactus Level 53 - Herb Patch Level 66 - Allotment - Example: Onion, Sweetcorn, Strewberry & more! level 76 - Hops - Example : Hammerstone, Asgarnian, wildblood & more! level 91 - Bittercap mushroom
!! FARMING IS AUTO, NOT A CLICK SKILL LIKE IT WAS !!
All of them need 8 minutes to grow, But all of them have diffrent start timers. Like: Bush starts at 7min, Calguat at 6:45min, Cactus at 5min. (--> for example). Each patch the XP will increase alot since I think farming is abit of a pointless skill. If you are interested, try it yourself !
Pictures farming: [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1pcx74.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/ve3jn.png[/img]
Mining: Mining was like one purple rock, well I've made it diffrent!
Copper ore - Level 1. Iron ore - level 15. Coal ore - level 30. Gold ore - level 40. Mithril ore - level 55. Adamantite ore - level 70. Runite ore - level 85.
Like farming, Mining is the same. Mining is also an auto skill, But there one diffrent. The 'resource' can be depleted by an amount of time (10 seconds - 1minute). If it's depleted NONE can mine from the ore.
Mining Place Picture: [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/zv1wl4.png[/img]
Woodcutting & Fletching & Firemaking:
Woodcutting is an easy skill, You just go to a tree and click on the tree, You'll AUTO chop off some wood from the tree. One diffrent is there, the tree will regrow with a random timer from 5 seconds up to 55 seconds and the timer is for all the trees the same. You DONT NEED AN AXE!!!
Level 1: normal tree Level 30: willow tree Level 45: Maple tree Level 75: Yew tree Level 91: Magic tree
If you go to another tree, You'll also receive more XP, But each tree has an other regrow timer, like I said before!
Fletching: You Need a knife for this skill. You just click: Knife(log) + log(Knife) = Shortbow or Longbow
GUIDE:
TYPE LOG =============== LEVEL ===================== SHORTBOW OR LONGBOW
Normal 1 SHORTBOW Normal 10 LONGBOW
Willow 30 SHORTBOW Willow 40 LONGBOW
Maple 50 SHORTBOW Maple 60 LONGBOW
Yew 70 SHORTBOW Yew 80 LONGBOW
Magic 85 SHORTBOW Magic 92 LONGBOW
Firemaking: You need a tinderbox + log than the fire will come:
TYPE LOG =============== LEVEL
Normal 1
Willow 30
Maple 50
Yew 70
Magic 85
Pictures: [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2ep7typ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/e283b.png[/img]
Cooking:
Cooking used to be a click food -> range = Cooked food and keep repeating this is the old source. Well I've changed that and now its fully working auto cooking
Level 1 - Shrimp Level 40 - Lobster Level 76 - Shark Level 88 - Sea turtle
Picture:
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2ymitrk.png[/img]
Fishing:
Fishing is now also an auto skill, You just click on the fishing spot and you'll receive the TYPE fish and XP. Each spot is diffrent and each spot will give diffrent xp, it depens on the type fish.
Level 1 - Shrimp Level 40 - Lobster Level 80 - Shark Level 94 - Sea turtle
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/29pxb37.png[/img]
Herblore:
Here is fully recoded and is now soemthing totally diffrent than before. Now you must kill chaos druid at the herblore prison(EMOTE TAB TELEPORT). These chaos druid will drop ALL INGREDIENTS to make the pots. Just you all have to do is go to the location and use the right first ingredient on the second ingredient. See table here:
Herblore Level -- First Ingredient -- Second Ingredient -- Potion name 1 -- Unfishinshed pot(Guam) -- Eye of Newt -- Attack Potion
15 -- unfinished pot(marrentill) -- bear fur -- defence potion
30 -- unfinished pot(tarromin) -- limpwurt root -- strength potion
45 -- unfinished pot(harralander) -- red spider' eggs -- restore potion
55 -- unfinished pot(ranarr) -- snape grass -- prayer portion
70 -- unfinished pot(irit) -- unicorn horn dust -- super antiposion
80 -- unfinished pot(avantoe) -- mort myre fungi -- super energy
85 -- unfinished pot(kwuarm) -- dragon scale dust -- weapon poison
87 -- unfinished pot(cadantine) -- white berries -- super defence
90 -- unfinished pot(dwarf weed) -- wine of zamorak -- ranging potion
96 -- unfinished pot(torstol) -- jangerberries -- zamorak brew
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/28v5e90.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/344cgh2.png[/img]
Theiving:
How to get there? Got to ::skill or use the EMOTE TAB and click on skills. second go to the portal(not the skills shop) and click on it and than this option will appear and choose for loc 3. [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/ao9j6p.png[/img]
Now you'll appear at this location: [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/mmq6nt.png[/img]
Theiving used to be the 'money making' in the server. I've changed this into abit more usefull skill.
HOW? There are two stalls you can use for training other skills (GEM STALL: uncut gems(crafting) and (FISH STALL: raw fish). Also thieving will give you FASTER raw fish and uncut gems(which is usefull for faster training).
~!! BUTTT !!~ There is a chance that the stall is 'empty'. in the mean time cannot take any supplies from the stalls! SEE PICTURE: [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/a5hoig.png[/img]
THIEVING LEVEL -- STALL 1 -- Bakery stall 35 -- fur stall 65 -- silk stall 80 -- gem stall 87 -- fish stall 93 -- tea stall (GIVES ALOT MORE XP THAN FISH)
picture from stall: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/o56yap.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2po5dom.png[/img]
CRAFTING:
First of all, HOW CAN YOU GET THE GEMSS???
You can get them from the GEM rock (skills location 1) This require: level 1 mining. or you can get them by thieving, the gem stall. This require: level 80 thieving.
One note: You'll receive more gems and faster gems from the gem stall than from the gem rock, aswell the gem rock will deplete aswell faster.
picture: [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2cd8hdt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ionb09.png[/img]
How do you start?? First off all you need to buy a CHISEL from the skills shop, The skills shop is at any skill location (1, 2 or 3). It will only cost: 1gp. [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/24b8181.png[/img]
Than you only have to go to the gem rock(loc 1) or go to the gem stall(loc3, req: 80 thieving) Use the CHISEL on the uncut GEM and it will AUTO UNCUT them all!
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/nn1qnk.png[/img]
CRAFTING LEVEL -- UNCUT GEM 1 -- Opal 15 -- Jade 25 -- Red topaz 45 -- sapphire 60 -- emerald 70 -- ruby 80 -- diamond 90 -- dragonstone
SMITHING:
HOW TO GET THERE??? Go to ::skill or use the EMOTE TAB click on SKILLS and go to the portal and click on location 2. [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/33mtls3.png[/img]
How to make Bars? First go to the furnace and click on it, this interface will appear: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/14oaiv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/264i88j.png[/img]
You can get ores from mining.
Bar making: BRONZE: TIN ORE and COPPER ORE. [ 1 smithing ] IRON: IRON ORE. [ 15 smithing ] STEEL: IRON ORE and 2 COAL ORE. [ 30 smithing ] GOLD: GOLD ORE. [ 40 smithing ] MITHRIL: MITHRIL ORE and 4 COAL ORE. [ 55 smithing ] ADAMANTITE: ADAMANTITE ORE and 6 COAL ORE. [ 70 smithing ] RUNITE: RUNITE ORE and 8 COAL ORE. [ 85 smithing ]
RUNECRAFTING:
This is the guide how to train RUNECRAFTING on the server:
First: Click the emote tab and than click on skills
This will appear: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/mwa5uv.png[/img]
What you first need to do is collecting rune essence, so you must first go to the rune essence mine [ OPTION 3 ]. If you think, I''ve have enough for now, you can either teleport with the portal at rune essence mine or use ::skill and click on the [ teleport to runecrafting option ]
quick picture of the rune essence mine: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/am5qfd.png[/img]
quick picture of runecrafting location: [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2h5l7h5.png[/img]
And atleast the runecrafting level table:
[ LEVEL REQ. ] [ TYPE OF RUNE ] [ 1 ] [ Air ] [ 1 ] [ Mind ] [ 5 ] [ Water ] [ 9 ] [ Earth ] [ 14 ] [ Fire ] [ 27 ] [ Cosmic ] [ 44 ] [ Nature ] [ 54 ] [ Law ] [ 65 ] [ Death ] [ 82 ] [ Soul ]
NOTE: You can't buy any type of runes in this server. YOU HAVE TO MAKE THEM YOURSELF!!!
ENJOY RCING
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/29pxb37.png[/img]
OUR NEW NICE UPDATED HERBLORE ZONE ! ALSO WITH UPDATED AUTOMESSAGES AND DROPS ! Big thanks to Joon123 !
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ezk2hf.png[/img]
Also some random Boss attacks and specials ! For example Jad down here !
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/1551dm1.png[/img]
Jad's max hit is 55 ! so have a great hunt for the firecape !
Having a little/small dice system works great for me ! :)
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2eeheah.png[/img]
and last but not least our new Rares Area also with some nice randomdrops like Partyhats and cash !
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/99o2m8.png[/img]
we hope you guys will enjoy the server !
Yours,
DigiiMajor JOON123

item.title: AllstarMontana!
item.dc:creator: @digimajor digimajor
item.description:
@digimajor wrote:

Hello Everyone,

Our names are DigiiMajor & Joon123 !
most of you allstar players know who we are and what wheve done here .
Lets just say ; WE ARE BACK !
and guess what ? we just started a hole new epic allstar server with great stuff .
We hope you enjoy this BETA server for now , because we are still building this one to the next level and we just want to show you guys ,
how the server will looks like for how far it has been now .
Lets just say : We hope you guys enjoy this .
Have some goodluck playing this Server and help us out grown much as possible .
thank you .

DOWNLOADLINKS

What have I done so far?

[ FEATURES ]

  • ALL skills(except slayer - 60%) are 100% recoded and reworked the best I’ve could done. (see pictures below).
  • ANTI - SYI 100%
  • ANTI - HEIGHTLEVEL
  • ANTI - TRADEBUG
  • SKILL LOCATION REWORKED
  • SHOPS AND PRICES REWORKED
  • SLAYER MONSTER & BOSSES ARE ADDED( XP rates need to need to be added).
  • DICING SYSTEM
  • GSMINI
  • CLIENT COLOURS
  • BOSSES WITH WORKING SPECIALS
  • 100% PLAYERTITLES !
  • RESTART TIMER EVERY 90MIN
  • ANTI DUPE
  • SKILLCAPE EMOTES
  • RARES AREA ( FOR PARTYHATS )
    && theres lots which you can view below

AGILITY:

How to train AGILITY?
First go to skills, ::skill command.

In the north-east corner, there is hanging a rope, just click on it and it will teleport you to AGILITY.

NOW what you all have to do is run the course, SEE THE PICTURES!!!






That is agility.

I HOPE ENJOY IT

Farming:
There are now 7 diffrent paths.

Level 1 Bush - Example: Jangerberries, Dwellberries, Red Berries, White Berries, Poison Ivy & more
Level 25 - Calquat Tree
Level 45 - Cactus
Level 53 - Herb Patch
Level 66 - Allotment - Example: Onion, Sweetcorn, Strewberry & more!
level 76 - Hops - Example : Hammerstone, Asgarnian, wildblood & more!
level 91 - Bittercap mushroom

!! FARMING IS AUTO, NOT A CLICK SKILL LIKE IT WAS !!

All of them need 8 minutes to grow, But all of them have diffrent start timers.
Like: Bush starts at 7min, Calguat at 6:45min, Cactus at 5min. (–> for example).
Each patch the XP will increase alot since I think farming is abit of a pointless skill.
If you are interested, try it yourself !

Pictures farming:

Mining:
Mining was like one purple rock, well I’ve made it diffrent!

Copper ore - Level 1.
Iron ore - level 15.
Coal ore - level 30.
Gold ore - level 40.
Mithril ore - level 55.
Adamantite ore - level 70.
Runite ore - level 85.

Like farming, Mining is the same.
Mining is also an auto skill, But there one diffrent.
The ‘resource’ can be depleted by an amount of time (10 seconds - 1minute).
If it’s depleted NONE can mine from the ore.

Mining Place Picture:

Woodcutting & Fletching & Firemaking:

Woodcutting is an easy skill, You just go to a tree and click on the tree, You’ll AUTO chop off some wood from the tree.
One diffrent is there, the tree will regrow with a random timer from 5 seconds up to 55 seconds and the timer is for all the trees the same.
You DONT NEED AN AXE!!!

Level 1: normal tree
Level 30: willow tree
Level 45: Maple tree
Level 75: Yew tree
Level 91: Magic tree

If you go to another tree, You’ll also receive more XP, But each tree has an other regrow timer, like I said before!

Fletching:
You Need a knife for this skill.
You just click: Knife(log) + log(Knife) = Shortbow or Longbow

GUIDE:

TYPE LOG =============== LEVEL ===================== SHORTBOW OR LONGBOW

Normal 1 SHORTBOW
Normal 10 LONGBOW

Willow 30 SHORTBOW
Willow 40 LONGBOW

Maple 50 SHORTBOW
Maple 60 LONGBOW

Yew 70 SHORTBOW
Yew 80 LONGBOW

Magic 85 SHORTBOW
Magic 92 LONGBOW

Firemaking:
You need a tinderbox + log than the fire will come:

TYPE LOG =============== LEVEL

Normal 1

Willow 30

Maple 50

Yew 70

Magic 85

Pictures:

Cooking:

Cooking used to be a click food -> range = Cooked food and keep repeating this is the old source.
Well I’ve changed that and now its fully working auto cooking

Level 1 - Shrimp
Level 40 - Lobster
Level 76 - Shark
Level 88 - Sea turtle

Picture:

Fishing:

Fishing is now also an auto skill, You just click on the fishing spot and you’ll receive the TYPE fish and XP.
Each spot is diffrent and each spot will give diffrent xp, it depens on the type fish.

Level 1 - Shrimp
Level 40 - Lobster
Level 80 - Shark
Level 94 - Sea turtle

Herblore:

Here is fully recoded and is now soemthing totally diffrent than before.
Now you must kill chaos druid at the herblore prison(EMOTE TAB TELEPORT).
These chaos druid will drop ALL INGREDIENTS to make the pots.
Just you all have to do is go to the location and use the right first ingredient on the second ingredient.
See table here:

Herblore Level – First Ingredient – Second Ingredient – Potion name
1 – Unfishinshed pot(Guam) – Eye of Newt – Attack Potion

15 – unfinished pot(marrentill) – bear fur – defence potion

30 – unfinished pot(tarromin) – limpwurt root – strength potion

45 – unfinished pot(harralander) – red spider’ eggs – restore potion

55 – unfinished pot(ranarr) – snape grass – prayer portion

70 – unfinished pot(irit) – unicorn horn dust – super antiposion

80 – unfinished pot(avantoe) – mort myre fungi – super energy

85 – unfinished pot(kwuarm) – dragon scale dust – weapon poison

87 – unfinished pot(cadantine) – white berries – super defence

90 – unfinished pot(dwarf weed) – wine of zamorak – ranging potion

96 – unfinished pot(torstol) – jangerberries – zamorak brew

Pictures:


Theiving:

How to get there?
Got to ::skill or use the EMOTE TAB and click on skills.
second go to the portal(not the skills shop) and click on it and than this option will appear and choose for loc 3.

Now you’ll appear at this location:

Theiving used to be the ‘money making’ in the server.
I’ve changed this into abit more usefull skill.

HOW?
There are two stalls you can use for training other skills (GEM STALL: uncut gems(crafting) and (FISH STALL: raw fish).
Also thieving will give you FASTER raw fish and uncut gems(which is usefull for faster training).

~!! BUTTT !!~
There is a chance that the stall is ‘empty’. in the mean time cannot take any supplies from the stalls!
SEE PICTURE:

THIEVING LEVEL – STALL
1 – Bakery stall
35 – fur stall
65 – silk stall
80 – gem stall
87 – fish stall
93 – tea stall (GIVES ALOT MORE XP THAN FISH)

picture from stall:

CRAFTING:

First of all, HOW CAN YOU GET THE GEMSS???

You can get them from the GEM rock (skills location 1)
This require: level 1 mining.
or you can get them by thieving, the gem stall.
This require: level 80 thieving.

One note: You’ll receive more gems and faster gems from the gem stall than from the gem rock, aswell the gem rock will deplete aswell faster.

picture:

How do you start??
First off all you need to buy a CHISEL from the skills shop, The skills shop is at any skill location (1, 2 or 3).
It will only cost: 1gp.

Than you only have to go to the gem rock(loc 1) or go to the gem stall(loc3, req: 80 thieving)
Use the CHISEL on the uncut GEM and it will AUTO UNCUT them all!

CRAFTING LEVEL – UNCUT GEM
1 – Opal
15 – Jade
25 – Red topaz
45 – sapphire
60 – emerald
70 – ruby
80 – diamond
90 – dragonstone

SMITHING:

HOW TO GET THERE???
Go to ::skill or use the EMOTE TAB click on SKILLS and go to the portal and click on location 2.

How to make Bars?
First go to the furnace and click on it, this interface will appear:

You can get ores from mining.

Bar making:
BRONZE: TIN ORE and COPPER ORE. [ 1 smithing ]
IRON: IRON ORE. [ 15 smithing ]
STEEL: IRON ORE and 2 COAL ORE. [ 30 smithing ]
GOLD: GOLD ORE. [ 40 smithing ]
MITHRIL: MITHRIL ORE and 4 COAL ORE. [ 55 smithing ]
ADAMANTITE: ADAMANTITE ORE and 6 COAL ORE. [ 70 smithing ]
RUNITE: RUNITE ORE and 8 COAL ORE. [ 85 smithing ]

RUNECRAFTING:

This is the guide how to train RUNECRAFTING on the server:

First:
Click the emote tab and than click on skills

This will appear:

What you first need to do is collecting rune essence, so you must first go to the rune essence mine [ OPTION 3 ].
If you think, I’'ve have enough for now, you can either teleport with the portal at rune essence mine or use ::skill and click on the [ teleport to runecrafting option ]

quick picture of the rune essence mine:

quick picture of runecrafting location:

And atleast the runecrafting level table:

[ LEVEL REQ. ] [ TYPE OF RUNE ]
[ 1 ] [ Air ]
[ 1 ] [ Mind ]
[ 5 ] [ Water ]
[ 9 ] [ Earth ]
[ 14 ] [ Fire ]
[ 27 ] [ Cosmic ]
[ 44 ] [ Nature ]
[ 54 ] [ Law ]
[ 65 ] [ Death ]
[ 82 ] [ Soul ]

NOTE: You can’t buy any type of runes in this server.
YOU HAVE TO MAKE THEM YOURSELF!!!

ENJOY RCING

OUR NEW NICE UPDATED HERBLORE ZONE ! ALSO WITH UPDATED AUTOMESSAGES AND DROPS !
Big thanks to Joon123 !

Also some random Boss attacks and specials ! For example Jad down here !

Jad’s max hit is 55 ! so have a great hunt for the firecape !

Having a little/small dice system works great for me !

and last but not least our new Rares Area also with some nice randomdrops like Partyhats and cash !

we hope you guys will enjoy the server !

Yours,

DigiiMajor
JOON123

Read full topic
